insights.finding: This is a base class for password reset functionality that appears to be part of a training/educational application (WebGoat). While password reset functionality is security-critical, this particular file only contains basic class structure without actual implementation details.
insights.recommendation: Ensure the actual password reset implementation (in child classes or related files) follows security best practices including: rate limiting, secure token generation, proper expiration times, and validation of user identity before allowing password changes.
